betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now that you have Steel, you can make a Hang Glider! This may help tremendously for Nether exploration.

If you do not have enough Leather yet, make a §9Butchering Knife§r and hunt some cows.


§bLore:§r The Hang Glider comes from OpenBlocks. Due to great utility of the Hang Glider, it was ported to a separated mod for people who do not want OpenBlocks in their modpack (like us!).
